name: Lost Soul (GiraDSC)
description:
“The world has long been lost to the end times. Giants corpses reshape the land and monster walk the earth. What little humans remain have gone into hiding and believed extinct.  Now, you, the last of the shamanic spirits after being left sleeping and forgotten, have awakened. It’s your job to search the dangerous lands for the human safe haven.”

This is the story behind my game short Metroidvania inspired game. The player must fight off enemies and perform deadly jumps to escape the cavern you find yourself in.

This is my first game I have made and publish myself. I made this game as a single part of a larger game in mind.
